system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 1st-level, your archetype spells are selected from one of several lists, chosen from below. Your choice of archetype spell list affects other features from this archetype.

Table: Fire Priest Spells

1 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.fdkaoynn8g8aqxdr]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z7r6plq6vyesck07]{Faerie Fire}
3 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.2ikwrgg6cpegvoa1]{Flaming Sphere}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.p647d38olyr3pr52]{Heat Metal}
5 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ew3qtw0gvzelrmgg]{Daylight}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.n7vv8e7phkfc513j]{Fireball}
7 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.lnbcwy44k19g4bbu]{Fire Shield} (warm shield only), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.1b2ean5arnl3tob0]{Wall of Fire}
9 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.633bpp281x35cz6t]{Conjure Elemental} (fire only), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.c2mhqi8hbsck0pdy]{Flame Strike}
